description: Put down an item from hand to a specific location
usage: Use when you want to place an item from your hand to a specific location (table, shelf, floor, etc.).

parameters.target_key: Key of the location to put the item down (e.g., 'table', 'shelf', 'floor')
parameters: Specific location or surface to place the item

examples.scenario: Putting down a coffee cup on the table after drinking coffee at a cafe
parameters: Table location to place the coffee cup

examples.scenario: Putting down purchased items on the counter at a convenience store
parameters: Counter location to place the items

requirements: Must have an item in hand
Must be able to place the item at that location
when_to_use: When you want to store an item you're holding at a specific location
When you want to clean up after using an item
When you want to temporarily place an item before passing it to someone else
